name: Greninja
description: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.

abilities.name: Battle Bond
abilities.effect: Transforms this Pokémon into Ash-Greninja after fainting an opponent.  Water Shuriken's power is 20 and always hits three times.  This ability cannot be copied or replaced.  This ability only takes effect for Greninja.
abilities.description: Defeating an opposing Pokémon strengthens the Pokémon’s bond with its Trainer, and it becomes Ash-Greninja. Water Shuriken gets more powerful.
